pages.text: $(li)The Deep Ocean is a variant of the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/water/ocean)Ocean$(/l).$(br)$(li)It can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)The terrain of this place is composed of mostly by Gravel.$(br)$(li)You can find some water vegetation too, like Seagrass or Kelp Plants.

$(li)Some aquatic animals like Cods, Salmons, $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/dolphin)Dolphins$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/squid)Squids$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/cachalot_whale)Cachalot Whales$(/l), and $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/frilled_shark)Frilled Sharks$(/l) can be found here too.$(br)$(li)You can search this biome introducing the words $(l)Deep Ocean$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
